Options.Name: Lunar
Options.Description: You remember the Moon from before it was crowded.

Options.Name: Martian
Options.Description: You remember the Moon from before it was crowded.

Options.Name: Orbital
Options.Description: You overlook the Earth.

Options.Name: Rimward Colonist
Options.Description: You settle Titan, the Main Belt, or an outer-system moon.

Options.Name: Rural Martian
Options.Description: You homestead the Martian outback.

Options.Name: Spacer
Options.Description: You grow up on or work the ships that bring life to the colonies.

Options.Name: Sunward Colonist
Options.Description: You grow up on or work the ships that bring life to the colonies.

Options.Name: Ascendor
Options.Description: Against the odds, you work your way up from the poverty of the underclasses.

Options.Name: Corporate Drifter
Options.Description: You bounce between hypercorp positions.

Options.Name: Corporate Favorite
Options.Description: You enjoy a steady corporate gig.

Options.Name: Inheritor
Options.Description: You benefit from generational wealth.

Options.Name: Opportunist
Options.Description: You claw your way into the enclaves via criminal endeavors.

Options.Name: Nomad
Options.Description: You move a lot, chasing work and avoiding climate problems and unrest.

Options.Name: Precarious
Options.Description: You get by, but work and simple existence are tenuous.

Options.Name: Self-Reliant
Options.Description: You survive by DIY means.

Options.Name: Steady
Options.Description: You live in relative stability.

Options.Name: Surrounded by Wolves
Options.Description: You live and work in an area rife with corruption and lawlessness.

Options.Name: Breakthrough
Options.Description: You had the right idea at the right time.

Options.Name: Hypercorp Royalty
Options.Description: You family is among the business elites.

Options.Name: Media Famous
Options.Description: Your family was often in the spotlight.

Options.Name: Oligarch Dynasty
Options.Description: Your family is rich, wellconnected, and stays out of the spotlight.

Options.Name: Space Entrepreneur
Options.Description: Your family made its fortunes off-world.

Options.Name: Drone Operator
Options.Description: You manipulate machines from afar.

Options.Name: Educator
Options.Description: You teach or train others.

Options.Name: Emancipated
Options.Description: You work your way to freedom off-world.

Options.Name: Labor Camps
Options.Description: You toil off-world.

Options.Name: Private Staff
Options.Description: You serve the hyperelites or corporate leadership.

Options.Name: Vac Worker
Options.Description: You build habitats or ships.

Options.Name: Virtual Worker
Options.Description: You wrangle data in corporate systems.

Options.Name: Anomaly
Options.Description: Your codebase is not based on standard human mind patterns.

Options.Name: Emergent Uplift
Options.Description: You are a smart machine that was on the cusp of achieving intelligence when the programmers reshaped you.

Options.Name: Humanities AGI
Options.Description: You are designed to understand and interact with humans.

Options.Name: Machine AGI
Options.Description: Your mind is optimized for controlling apps and hardware.

Options.Name: Part Human
Options.Description: Your codeline is merged with the neural patterns of a human fork.

Options.Name: Research AGI
Options.Description: You are optimized for investigation, data analysis, and scientific endeavors.

Options.Name: Drifter
Options.Description: You wander the outskirts of transhuman space.

Options.Name: Religious Sect
Options.Description: Your cult or religious group establishes an off-world haven.

Options.Name: Separatist
Options.Description: Your people are political dissidents, persecuted minorities, refugees, or others who seek safety on the fringes of the Solar System.

Options.Name: Survivalist
Options.Description: Your family fears trouble on Earth and bunkers down off-world.

Options.Name: Alien Mind
Options.Description: Your mind is nothing like those around you.

Options.Name: Disturbed Child
Options.Description: You bear permanent mental scars that are often apparent to others.

Options.Name: Long Past Normal
Options.Description: You pass yourself as normal, but there are deep cracks in your foundation

Options.Name: Masked Monster
Options.Description: You are a sociopath, but you hide it well.

Options.Name: Twisted Experiment
Options.Description: Your oddness is palpable.

Options.Name: Criminal
Options.Description: You make a living by the only means available to you.

Options.Name: Radical
Options.Description: You fight against oppressive systems.

Options.Name: Refugee
Options.Description: You are forced to flee war or climate catastrophe.

Options.Name: Street Rat
Options.Description: You navigate the challenges of your class with deftness.

Options.Name: Survivor
Options.Description: You do what it takes to get by.

Options.Name: Escapee
Options.Description: You escape or are liberated from your

Options.Name: Feral
Options.Description: You are not as humanized as other uplifts.

Options.Name: Lab Rat
Options.Description: You are a test subject or corporate slave.

Options.Name: Model Specimen
Options.Description: You are proof of the success of transhumanity’s uplift project.
